catalog_info.title: Modern and Contemporary Poets: Graduate Seminar
catalog_info.description: Major poets and poems from T.S. Eliot and Robert Frost almost to the present day: we may also read, among others, William Carlos Williams, Wallace Stevens, Elizabeth Bishop, Robert Lowell, Lorine Niedecker, Gwendolyn Brooks, James Merrill and John Ashbery. Appropriate both for students who know some of these poets well, and for those relatively new to the study of poems.
